title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Education) (No.2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister education) (no.2) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Christopher Mannion particulars of whose address have been deposited
text_raw:
2. Christopher Mannion particulars of whose address have been deposited 
at the offices of the Department of Education, Marlborough Street, Dublin 1, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Education with effect 
from 7 November 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [706] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
